name: Fur Fury
description: Third person tactical action in flag capture mode. Players have to split into two teams and confront each other.  Protect your house or try to steal treats – choice is yours! Join one of the teams, plan tactics and try to win! Several game modes, dozens of objects to interact with, exciting gameplay and pretty graphics – all in one!  Six character classes, interactive environment and customization are waiting for you in team play game – FurFury. Remember, everything can turn against you any moment!
